all u have to do is install the trial version then copy and paste the crack in the "Inspiration" folder in Program Files(or where u installed it) then run the crack and click patch and it should be successful. JUST MAKE SURE THAT U DONT HAVE THE PROGRAM RUNNING WHILE U PUT THE CRACK OR EALSE YOU WILL RECIEVE A MESSAGE SAYING ERROR PATCHING. Enjoy!
